text: Karim Salman (4 March 1965 - 2 December 2020) was an Iraqi football defender. He played for Iraq in the 1988 Summer Olympics. He played for the national team between 1988 and 1993. Salman died on 2 December 2020, aged 55, from COVID-19 in Baghdad.Iraqi coach dies of coronavirus ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Iraqi football managers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Iraq Category:Olympians for Iraq
title: Karim Salman
